cgcloud__Sales_Folder__c.name: cgcloud__Sales_Folder__c
cgcloud__Sales_Folder__c.description: This object contains the attributes that are associated with the Sales Folder.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Note__c.description: General notes about the Sales Folder.

cgcloud__Sales_Folder_Template__c.description: Reference to the Sales Folder Template.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the sales folder belongs.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: First date of the validity period of the sales folder.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Last date of the validity period of the sales folder.
